name: btb-events
description: Example static block scaffolded with Create Block tool.

scripts.setup: npm install && npm audit fix && npm run start:dev
scripts.setup:clean: npm install && npm clean-install && npm audit fix && npm run start:dev
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:before && cross-env webpack --colors --env.development && npm run clean:after
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:before && cross-env webpack --colors --env.production && npm run clean:after
scripts.build:prod:analyze: npm run clean:before && cross-env webpack --colors --env.production --env.analyze && npm run clean:after
scripts.clean:after: find . -type f -name 'base' -exec rm {} + && find . -type f -name 'base-admin' -exec rm {} + && find . -type f -name 'style' -exec rm {} + && find . -type f -name 'editor' -exec rm {} +
